Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.iterators

Class ClockWiseIterator

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.iterators.ClockWiseIterator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterator<Board>
public class ClockWiseIterator extends Object implements Iterator<Board>
This class provides an implementation of the Iterator<Board> interface. This iterator offers a custom implementation that allows to start the iteration from a given startIndex of the list. Iterating from element @ startIndex to last element @ startIndex - 1 || list.size() - 1, it conventionally follows a clockwise scan of the list.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • ClockWiseIterator

      public ClockWiseIterator(List<Board> list, int startIndex) throws IllegalArgumentException, IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Custom startIndex constructor. Sets the list of boards to the one passed via parameter and sets the custom startIndex.
      Parameters:
      list - the list to iterate on
      startIndex - the custom startIndex for the iteration
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if list == null
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if startIndex is out of range
